        Gets the alert threshold of the scanner, possibly returning Plugin.AlertThreshold.DEFAULT.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getAlertThreshold

        public Plugin.AlertThreshold getAlertThreshold()
        Gets the alert threshold of the scanner.

        If the alert threshold was set to DEFAULT it's returned the default value set.

        Returns:
        the alert threshold of the scanner.
        Since:
        2.7.0
        See Also:
        #setAlertThreshold(AlertThreshold), getAlertThreshold(boolean)

      • getAlertThreshold

        public Plugin.AlertThreshold getAlertThreshold(boolean incDefault)
        Gets the alert threshold of the scanner, possibly returning Plugin.AlertThreshold.DEFAULT.
        Parameters:
        incDefault - true if the value Plugin.AlertThreshold.DEFAULT can be returned, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        the alert threshold.
